…hundreds of thousands of veterans finally having their  disability recognized, making them eligible for the VR&E program.  However, that massive influx of new applicants has brought to light  improvements that are needed for the VR&E program.

This legislation seeks to add some good-governance steps to the  program, to make sure veterans are aware of how the…
